en.title: Use Mattermost Cloud for free forever
en.description: Use Mattermost Cloud to automate upgrades, decrease hosting costs, and remove maintenance overhead while keeping global security standards - for free! Create your free workspace today.

en.title: New desktop version available
en.description: Download and update now for the last time! You'll be alerted as new releases become available and can update in one-click.

en.title: Mattermost 7.0 is here!
en.description: Mattermost v7.0 includes general availability of [collapsed reply threads](https://docs.mattermost.com/channels/organize-conversations.html), [voice calls and screen share (beta)](https://docs.mattermost.com/channels/make-calls.html), [messaging format toolbar](https://docs.mattermost.com/channels/format-messages.html), [Playbooks inline editor](https://docs.mattermost.com/playbooks/customize-a-playbook.html#edit-a-playbook), usage statistics, and ability to change [triggers and actions mid-run](https://docs.mattermost.com/playbooks/customize-a-run.html). [Upgrading](https://docs.mattermost.com/upgrade/upgrading-mattermost-server.html) only takes a few minutes.

en.title: Collapsed Reply Threads are here, now in general availability!
en.description:
Experience a better way to communicate in threads that keeps your channels and conversations organized.

You can now enable Collapsed Reply Threads by default for all users in **System Console** > **Posts** > **Collapsed Reply Threads**.

en.title: Now enable Collapsed Reply Threads by default for all users!
en.description: You can now enable Collapsed Reply Threads by default for all users in **System Console** > **Posts** > **Collapsed Reply Threads**.

en.title: Experience a better way to communicate in threads
en.description:
Welcome to Collapsed Reply Threads! You can now find, follow, and resume conversations more easily, and keep discussion threads focused.

You can always disable it in **Settings** > **Display** > **Collapsed Reply Threads**

en.title: Experience a better way to communicate in threads
en.description: Welcome to Collapsed Reply Threads! You can now find, follow, and resume conversations more easily, and keep discussion threads focused.

en.title: New tools, new interface
en.description: Mattermost is expanding our open source collaboration platform to include new integrated tools that address a wider variety of workflow types. Playbooks are for well-defined processes that typically follow a checklist-based structure. Boards are for managing and organizing projects and tasks across the entire product lifecycle.

en.title: Manage your projects and tasks in one place
en.description: View your active projects and work items, update weekly status and more by selecting Boards from the top-left menu.
